description:
The spec "Virt driver large pages allocation for guest RAM" ( http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/kilo/implemented/virt-driver-large-pages.html ) was marked as complete for Kilo. 

However, the options to include standard Hugepage sizes 2MB and 1GB is not supported.

The flavor extra spec key hw:mem_page_size=2MB|1GB is not supported.
title: hw:mem_page_size=2MB|1GB unsupported
